 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִילָן‎</span> ([[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>138</sup>) **noun masculine**<sup>[[Dan.4.7|Dan 4:7]]</sup> ==tree== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִילָן‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֵלָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֵלוֺן‎</span>); — absolute<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎א‎</span> [[Dan.4.7|Dan 4:7]] emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נָא‎</span>- v.[[Dan.4.8|Dan 4:8]] v.[[Dan.4.11|Dan 4:11]] v.[[Dan.4.17|Dan 4:17]] v.[[Dan.4.20|Dan 4:20]] v.[[Dan.4.23|Dan 4:23]].
